articles.title: Diaz honoured by praise as Asian body says Games go-ahead ‘correct’ - South China Morning Post
articles.description: Olympic Council of Asia basks in bumper medal haul, saying Hidilyn Diaz ‘produced one of the highlights of the Games’ with weightlifter vowing to ‘continue inspiring Filipinos’.
